chapter.title: Activiti Modeler
chapter.para: The Activiti Modeler is a web based process editor that can be used to author BPMN 2.0 process graphically using nothing more then a browser. The process files are stored by the server on a the file system, such that they are easily accessible and can be imported without hassles into any Java IDE.
The Activiti Modeler is automatically installed during the demo setup.

section.title: Changing the location of the process model repository
section.para: After running the demo setup, process xml files are stored in the apps/activiti-model-repository folder. The location of the file-based repository can be switched by changing the fileSystemRootDirectory property in the (exploded)activiti-modeler.war/WEB-INF/classes/configuration.properties file.

section.title: Changing the host of the Modeler
section.para: After running the demo setup, the Activiti Modeler will accessible only on the locahlhost address. When you want to change the host of the Modeler, eg. to run it centrally on a server, change the host property in the (exploded)activiti-modeler.war/WEB-INF/classes/configuration.properties file.
